name: 黃聲東
objective: 介紹單位換算與有效數位，元素的原子結構、化學方程式平衡與計算，反應熱，氣體與氣體定律，大氣層與環境污染，週期表，化學鍵，化合物的分子結構，熱力學，動力學，反應機構，平衡常數，氧化與還原，酸鹼反應，電化學，混合物的分離及現代科技材料，奠定良好化學基礎。
schedule:
Weeks	Date	Content
1	2/23, 2/25	Chapter 11 Electrochemistry
2	3/2, 3/4	Chapter 12 Quantum Mechanics and Atomic theory 
3	3/9, 3/11	Chapter 12 Quantum Mechanics and Atomic theory
4	3/16, 3/18	Chapter 13 Bonding: General Concepts
5	3/23, 3/25	Chapter 13 Bonding: General Concepts; 
6	3/30,         Exam I (March 30th, Chapter 11-13) 
        4/1	        Chapter 14 Covalent Bonding
7	4/6,           清明放假
        4/8	        Chapter 14 Covalent Bonding
8	4/13, 4/15	Chapter 15 Chemical Kinetics
9	4/20, 4/22	Chapter 15 Chemical Kinetics
10	4/27, 4/29	Chapter 16 Liquid and Solid
11	5/4, 5/6	Chapter 16 Liquid and Solid
12	5/11, 5/13	Review Chapter 14-16
13	5/18,         Exam II May 18th (Chapter 14-16)
        5/20	         Chapter 17 Properties of solution 
14	5/25, 5/27	Chapter 17 Properties of solution
15	6/1, 6/3	Chapter 18 The Representative Elements; Group 1A through 8A
16	6/8, 6/10	Chapter 19 Transition Metals and Coordination Chemistry
17	6/15, 6/17	Review Chapter 17-19
18	6/22	        Exam III (June 22th, Chapter 17-19)
scorePolicy:
所有考試題目都是英文出題，可使用翻譯機或字典及計算機。
Exam I (30%); Exam II (30%); Exam III (30%); Attendance (10 %) 
及格分數為60分 
考試未出席且未請假，分數為0分計算。
考試請假只有1次機會且不補考，缺考成績由其他2次考試分數平均x 0.7計算。
materials: Zumdahl, Steven S., Chemical Principles; Seventh Edition, Houghton Mifflin Company
